generated_description: fundacja krok po kroku is a non-profit organization based in oława, lower silesian voivodeship, poland. established in 2011, the foundation provides support to children with physical and intellectual disabilities. it offers free therapeutic support through the early support for development program (wwrd) and various forms of rehabilitation. the organization also promotes medical marijuana as a treatment option and hosts international conferences to educate and advocate for its use. fundacja krok po kroku operates a rehabilitation center equipped with sensory-stimulating devices and provides innovative therapies such as hyperbaric oxygen therapy and transcranial direct current stimulation (tdcs). the foundation collaborates with local communities and supports families and caregivers of children with disabilities.
